description:
doc: add Gobs of data article

Originally published on The Go Programming Language Blog, March 24, 2011.

http://blog.golang.org/2011/03/gobs-of-data.html

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html File doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode132 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:132: The encoded gob data isn't about int8s and uint16s. int8s uint16s http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode189 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:189: From integers we can build all the other types: bytes, drop the on these http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode296 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:296: You can compile and run this example code by copying it into the s/by copying it into/in/ http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode303 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:303: That's a subject for another post. s/post/article/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/progs/gobs2.go
File doc/progs/gobs2.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/progs/gobs2.go#newcode45
doc/progs/gobs2.go:45: // STOP OMIT
drop this and put $ instead of 'STOP' in the {{code}}

ptal https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html File doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode132 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:132: The encoded gob data isn't about int8s and uint16s. On 2012/03/15 05:56:19, adg wrote: > int8s > uint16s Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode189 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:189: From integers we can build all the other types: bytes, On 2012/03/15 05:56:19, adg wrote: > drop the on these Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode296 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:296: You can compile and run this example code by copying it into the On 2012/03/15 05:56:19, adg wrote: > s/by copying it into/in/ Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html#newcode303 doc/articles/gobs_of_data.html:303: That's a subject for another post. On 2012/03/15 05:56:19, adg wrote: > s/post/article/ Done. https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/progs/gobs2.go File doc/progs/gobs2.go (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/5834043/diff/3001/doc/progs/gobs2.go#newcode45 doc/progs/gobs2.go:45: // STOP OMIT On 2012/03/15 05:58:21, adg wrote: > drop this and put $ instead of 'STOP' in the {{code}} Done.
